snippet: A military official said about 20 gunmen in weapon-mounted vehicles took a checkpoint by surprise in Egypt’s western desert, killing at least 20 soldiers.
abstract: Gunmen attack border guard post in western Egypt, killing at least 21 soldiers; military believes terrorists are responsible, but does not provide any information about the gunmen.
lead_paragraph: A military official said about 20 gunmen in weapon-mounted vehicles took a checkpoint by surprise in Egypt’s western desert, killing at least 20 soldiers.

headline.main: Attack Kills at Least 21 Egyptian Soldiers at Checkpoint in Western Desert
headline.print_headline: Attack Kills at Least 21 Egyptian Soldiers at Checkpoint in Western Desert

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
